name: Donald Duck
subtitle: Perfect Gentleman
author: Ron Baird

additional_info.title: FAQ 1
additional_info.body:
Q: If I chose not to draw with Donald Duck- Perfect Gentlemanâ€™s Allow Me ability, can my opponent still use it to draw a card?

A: Yes, they can. Each player individually decides whether or not they want to use the ability to draw a card at the start of your turn.

rules_text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3 to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) ALLOW ME At the start of your turn, each player may draw a card.
